name: Blackcurrant Sorbet
description:
This is a blackcurrant sorbet, with hints of blackberry and blueberry
Feel free to add koolada, VT Sorbet Base, or Menthol for iciness

Made for "The Sorbet Secret" Member Article
-> https://diyordievaping.com/2018/04/26/the-sorbet-secret-diy-eliquid-recipe/
author: ENYAWREKLAW

reviews.text: Very nice blackberry/blackcurrent mix here with a nice sharp bite to boot, very tasty and worth a mix.

I really enjoy this glad that I mixed it. Now I have a great base for a Sorbet with the lemon lime. The sorbet stays with the mix strong while vaping my 60ml bottle I made but the blackberry fades by the end of the bottle. The blackcurrant stayed though. Thanks for a great recipe
